MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH32, EH39 and EH41 postcode areas of Longniddry, North Berwick and Haddington. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 5.57pm. Our team has managed to restore power to a number of properties in the area and are carrying out onsite investigation to locate the fault affecting the rest of our customers without power. We now expect all power to be back on as quickly and as safely as possible by midnight. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7.51pm on 4th December 2020.
